member.name: NMHEADERA
member.summary: Contains information about header control notification messages. This structure supersedes theHD_NOTIFY structure.

member.name: NMHEADERA.hdr
member.summary: A structure that contains information about the notification message.

member.name: NMHEADERA.iItem
member.summary: The zero-based index of the header item that is the focus of the notification message.

summary.para: A value specifying the index of the mouse button used to generate the notification message. This member can be one of the following values:

member.name: NMHEADERA.pitem
member.summary: An optional pointer to an structure containing information about the item specified byiItem. Themask member of the HDITEM structure indicates which of its members are valid.
